apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of the couple with a heart, featuring a man and a person with medium-dark skin tones, showcases a tender embrace highlighted by a prominent, glossy red heart. The figures are depicted with smooth gradients and subtle 3D shading, giving them a warm and inviting appearance characteristic of Apple's design language. This emoji beautifully symbolizes romantic love, strong relationships, and deep affection between two individuals, often used to celebrate partnerships or express heartfelt sentiments.
